activities: Uses include HR administration and reports; job applications; background checks; development & training; compensation & benefits; expense payment; relocation; travel card use; workers’ compensation; health/safety; IT use; legal compliance; headcount/demographics; staffing; succession planning; labor relations; curriculum vitae; emergency contacts; substance screening; health services; employee benefits; security; investigations; Ombuds/DIALOG; government inquiries; taxation; visas; licenses; right-to-work; communications; payroll; Enterprise Resource Planning systems; litigation; trade compliance; sanctions screening; M&A; administration of customer & supplier agreements; marketing support; customer support; budgeting; invoicing; customer & supplier training; auditing; risk management; project management.
